title: Week 8 Picks; Ain’t Played Nobody-itis; Vegas Juice
description:
Rece Davis Pete Thamel and Bill Connelly make their Week 8 picks in the Race for the Ribeye and discuss Bill dragging everyone into the mud with his picks, inclusion vs. meritocracy with the College Football Playoff, if Syracuse can move the ball on Clemson, Ole Miss’ ham-and-egg start, Oregon’s upswing, how much they trust Texas, the collection of tailbacks in Penn State-Minnesota, sticking with preseason hunches, and TCU’s winning streak against ranked teams.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
